title: Fierce Battle Breakout
description: Play Fierce Battle Breakout online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Just Slap It!
description: Just Slap It is a fun and lighthearted slap-based game where timing and accuracy are key. Compete in slap battles, perfect your timing, and climb the leaderboard to showcase your skills. With simple controls and engaging gameplay, challenge yourself to out-slap opponents and rise to the top. Unlock upgrades and enjoy quick, casual fun anytime.
instructions: Just click/tap on screen to slap!

title: Cars Derby Arena
description: Welcome to the world of Car Derby Arena! In this exciting game you can enjoy the unique experience of changing the color of cars, improving their performance, and manipulating gravity and weather conditions. Your goal is to become an invincible master of destruction, pump up your car and crush everything in your path. Embark on exciting missions, compete with other players and prove your skills in this epic Car Derby Arena game!
instructions: PC control: WASD or arrows - drive. C - change camera. R - repair the car. F - nitro acceleration. P - pause game. Spacebar - handbrake. F2 - restart the level. G - open and close the gravity panel, slow down time. Keys 1 through 9 to switch the level of gravity, as well as the keys 0 and "-".

title: Dead Brain
description: “Dead Brain” puts you in the shoes of a fearless farmer standing between your crops and the undead hordes. With simple controls and intense action, players must strategically use random upgrades to survive each wave and push their limits. After each victorious wave, you'll get to choose a random bonus to aid your survival. Gain a new weapon, heal your hero, repair your defenses, or even boost your health! Are you ready to defend your farm and become the ultimate zombie-slaying hero?
instructions: Use your mouse to aim and shoot enimies.

title: Doomsday Tower Defense
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse in this fast-paced 2D top-down tower defense game. Construct and upgrade various defensive turrets to take down hordes of undead attackers. Earn coins by killing zombies and use them to purchase new towers, upgrade existing ones, or sell for cash and reinvest into a different turret. Defend your base from waves of shambling corpses as you fight to stay alive in a world gone mad.
instructions: Construct defensive turrets. Stop the zombie horde from reaching your base.

title: Squid Challenge: Play to Survive
description: Squid Challenge: Play to Survive is an intense survival game inspired by the thrilling challenges of the popular survival contest. Players must navigate through a series of deadly trials, testing their reflexes, strategy, and nerve. With each level, the difficulty increases, making it a true test of skill and endurance.
instructions: Survive all the dangerous challenges and progress through the rounds. Follow the game’s rules strictly—one mistake can mean elimination. Complete each task within the given time limit to advance. Controls: Tap or Swipe: Interact with objects and move your character. Hold & Release: Stop when required in "Red Light, Green Light." Button Mashing: Use rapid taps for strength-based challenges like Tug of War.

title: Lady Pool
description: We are glad to welcome you to the bright world of a humorous dress-up game where fashion collides with the comic book universe! Get ready for a creative reinterpretation of your favorite comic book anti-hero costumes: bold color combinations, unexpected prints and fun accessories are available to you. There is everything here: from funny hats that emphasize individuality to stylish superhero jumpsuits. Unleash your imagination!
instructions: Let's mentally jump into the comic book universe to create a vibrant and unusual female version of our favorite anti-hero. Successful images can be saved as PNG images. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Cannon Shooter
description: Cannon Shooter is an exciting arcade shooter where you can have endless shooting fun in fast-paced combat! You will control a cannonball firing hordes of heroic characters, facing many enemies. A quick click to launch more heroes and help you generate more heroes through the digital gate.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Killer Escape Huggy Extreme
description: This game is extremely more difficult and filled with challenges compared to the previous one. You need to become Huggy and catch all your clones. Catch all the clones and hunt them down, but remember, some of them must be thrown out of the maze. No one should see you, and you must not get caught while hunting someone. Be very careful, the clones are everywhere and extremely dangerous. Some doors can only be opened by you. Open the doors and hunt the clones.
instructions: *Use the "arrow keys" to move. *Press the "Space" key to kill someone. *Playable on both mobile and PC. *Collect energy boxes, extend the mission time.

title: Shelf Shift Match
description: Test your strategy and speed in Shelf Shift Match! Shift items on the shelves to create perfect matches of three, clearing the way to reveal hidden shadowed items. But beware—unwise moves can block your shelves, leaving no space to shift and leading to game over! If you're stuck, use the shuffle button to mix things up and find new matches.
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Police Chase Drifter
description: Police Chase Drifter is a fun car game where you get to run from the police, collect money bags and reach to the finishline. Earn money to buy more cars, fasters and enjoy the drifting.
instructions: Arrow keys and WSAD to accelerate, brakes and steer.

title: Winter Wolf
description: Winter has come, and the snowfall has begun. Since it's Christmas time, the wolf must find three stars during the winter. The wolf needs to carefully hunt and catch three sheep, take their stars, and gather all the bones on the path to avoid starving. It must also be cautious of the hunters in the forest. At the end of the level, it must reach the dark portal to teleport to its desired location.
instructions: *Use the "WASD" keys to move. *Double Jump is active. *Collect all 3 stars and bones to activate the dark portal.

title: War State IO - Conquer Battles
description: Welcome to ultimate strategy game that lets you improve your tactical skills and lead your troops to triumph! Lead your army, conquer enemy camps, and expand your territory in fast-paced battles filled with action and strategy. Every decision matters — whether you’re attacking enemy strongholds or defending your bases, clever maneuvers are key to achieving victory.
instructions: Drag your troops with your mouse/finger to the building you want to occupy. Occupy all enemy buildings to win.

title: Air Block
description: Jump, Place Blocks, and Conquer Challenging Levels! In Air Block, use quick reflexes and smart block placement to overcome obstacles and enemies. With limited blocks per level, every move counts! Avoid saws, spikes, and unlock doors to progress—plus, grab those bananas if you can! Game Modes: Single Player – Test your skills across unique levels. Two-Player Mode – Compete in quick place challenges and mini-games like Beach Ball, with more to come! Think you’ve got what it takes? Start now!
instructions: 1st Player Controls : A, W, D -> Move, Space -> Place blocks 2nd Player Controls: Up, Left, Right arrow keys -> Move, Left Mouse Click -> Place Blocks Tip: First Jump, Release the Jump Key and then Place the Blocks!

title: Squid Escape But Blockworld
description: You need to escape from the Squid competition, but while running away, you fell into the Block world. It’s a bit hard to escape from the Block world, but don’t stop and keep running. Never stop running until you reach the purple portal. Don’t forget to collect the money you see on the way. Be careful of the big monsters chasing you from behind; they want to catch you, and if they do, you’ll lose.
instructions: *Use the 'WASD' and 'Arrow keys' to move. *To survive, run to the portal at the end of the level and be careful of obstacles.

title: Bang Bang Mahjong
description: In Bang Bang Mahjong, we mix classic Mahjong with a sliding puzzle twist. It might seem simple at first, but as the levels get trickier, every move counts. Move the tiles around and match identical ones. Power-ups like shuffle, remove, or hints can help when things get tough. With each completed level, the challenge grows—but so does the satisfaction of solving it. Who can master every puzzle and clear the board like a pro?
instructions: Use the mouse or finger to move tiles around to align identical patterns, clearing them from the board.

title: Cleaning Princess
description: This is an ASMR game for girls. If you like to clean everything, our game is right for you. The game has 5 modes: ear cleaning, heel cleaning, back spa, teeth cleaning, and fan cleaning. You can use different tools to clean and massage your body parts. But it is important to note that each mode has a countdown time and you must choose the right tool to do the cleaning.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Gun Rush
description: Fire off your epic selection of awesome guns to reach the end of each level while causing chaos and destruction! Amass coins to unlock more guns across endless levels of utter carnage!!!!! (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻
instructions: Simply tap, click or press enter to shoot and move in the opposite direction you fire!

title: Color Race Obby
description: Color Race Obby is an exciting game inspired by Roblox and Obby. Compete with players online on a field of colored blocks. Enter the race and become the champion! Join the fun!
instructions: Your goal is to run to the finish line. Watch carefully what color will be next and have time to run to the block of this color. Controls on the computer: W,A,S,D - move the character Space - jump Mouse movement - camera movement Tab - show cursor Controls on the phone: Left joystick - move the character Right button - jump Swipe on the screen - camera movement

title: Vex X3M 2
description: Building on the classic Vex experience, VEX X3M2 introduces intense levels packed with new hazards and mechanics. New features like kite gliding let you soar over gaps, while teleportation portals help you navigate tricky sections. Floating platforms and shifting obstacles keep you on your toes, making every race an unpredictable thrill ride. Earn stars to unlock high-performance bike skins and conquer each track in easy and hard mode to prove yourself as the ultimate Vex champion!
instructions: Press up (or W) to accelerate, use left (or A) and right (or D) to tilt your bike and press backwards (or S) to brake. Look at your surroundings and pay attention to all the traffic signs! Good luck!

title: Wonders of Egypt Match
description: Begin a legendary journey in Wonders of Egypt Match, a thrilling Match 3 game set in Ancient Egypt! Join your guide, the Amara, as you match three or more gems and artifacts to uncover hidden treasures and secrets buried in pyramids, temples, and obelisks. With stunning visuals and immersive soundscapes, explore a world filled with ancient mysteries and challenges. Ready to prove your skills? Join the adventure and experience the wonders of Egypt today!
instructions: Match three or more identical symbols to clear them from the board. Each level has a specific goal, such as collecting certain symbols or removing obstacles. You have a limited number of moves, so strategise carefully! Use powerful boosters and the Amara’s wisdom to overcome tricky challenges. Watch out for unique obstacles inspired by Ancient Egypt. Match wisely, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets hidden within the pyramids!

title: Vibrant Hearts Glamour vs Punk
description: Two best girlfriends, Lily and Roxana, are striking opposites. Lily is the personification of tenderness and romance, dressed in airy pink dresses decorated with sequins and floral patterns. Roxanne is the true queen of punk rock, with her black leather dresses, gothic earrings and bold hairstyles. But do not forget about the third girlfriend, Melody, who masterfully combines both styles. Players will be able to experiment with outfits and choose which one is best suited for Valentine's Day!
instructions: Meet three BFF, who are getting ready to celebrate the long-awaited holiday. Each of the girlfriends has her own special fashion preferences, but it only depends on you in which outfits they will celebrate the holiday. The most successful images can be saved at the end of the game as PNG images. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it.

title: Bubble Shooter Panda Blast
description: Step into the colorful world of Panda Blast, where your mission is to rescue baby pandas by popping bubbles. Mama Panda needs your help to bring her lost cubs home. With vibrant graphics, charming animations, and exciting puzzles, this game is perfect for all ages. Match three or more bubbles to clear them, free trapped pandas, and progress through hundreds of fun levels. Use powerful boosters, enjoy daily rewards, and experience smooth animations that bring the adventure to life.
instructions: Match three or more bubbles to pop them. Aim carefully and shoot to rescue baby pandas. Use boosters to clear levels faster. Collect coins and unlock new challenges.

title: Foot Hospital
description: HELP! Doctor, I hurt my feet, ouch! It is so painful!Could you please help me to cure my feet? I know you have the best medical tools here!
instructions: Cure patient's feet

title: Art Salon
description: Welcome to Art Salon - Makeup & Nails, where your creativity knows no bounds! ? Whether you're passionate about fashion, beauty care, or just looking for a fun, relaxing game, this is the perfect app for you. From designing acrylic nails to creating stunning makeup looks, step into a world of endless beauty transformations in 3D! ??
instructions: Transform your clients from a mess to a princess with eye-catching makeup! Apply lipstick, blush, eyeshadow, and more. Experience satisfying ASMR as you create flawless looks. Perfect your techniques and go viral with your bold looks.

title: Mega Makeup - Seasons Best
description: Mega Makeup Seasons Best is the ultimate makeup game where creativity knows no bounds! Design stunning looks for each month of the year with vibrant eyeshadows, bold lipsticks, sparkling gems, and stylish accessories. Choose between Pro Mode for precision or Freestyle Mode for endless color combinations. Complete your seasonal masterpiece with matching jewelry and hair accessories. Perfect for makeup enthusiasts, this game is your go-to for all things beauty and style! Play now!
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on a desktop, tap to play on mobile devices.

title: Fashion Battle for Survival
description: In this puzzle game you have to test your memory by guessing the cards in pairs. Each correctly guessed pair brings you closer to winning the game round. And each successfully completed round opens the doors to the world of fashion, allowing you to dress up the main character of the game - an Asian beauty with a daring character. Remember that the time to complete the round is limited by a timer.
instructions: Help the Asian beauty replenish her wardrobe with new clothes and hairstyles by solving puzzles in the genre of «find a couple». The time to complete each puzzle is limited by a timer. If you do not have time to solve the puzzle in the allotted time, you will lose, but you can try again. At the finish location, you can view all unlocked achievements and take screenshots. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Mega Ramp Car
description: Mega Ramp Car is a game with maximum speed and huge jumps! Are you ready to make the biggest leap in history? Mega Ramp Car Features - Realistic physics and sound effects. - Real car collection - This game allows you to perform amazing stunts on different jumps. - Complete multiple levels and game modes for non-stop fun! - You have to complete many challenging missions, which makes the game even more exciting. Buy new cars to win new races.
instructions: Get ready for fun in the Mega Ramp Car! This addictive game allows you to drive cars and jump off big jumps. Choose your favorite car and complete different levels filled with huge jumps and cool stunts. Drive, drift, do tricks, it's all possible in this game.

title: Chicken Wild Run
description: Aim for the goal while collecting coins! Tap to change direction left and right. When your stamina runs out, the game is over. Get a kiss from a cute girl and become invincible! In invincible mode, you can bounce off obstacles. If you collect 10 mysterious bottles, the coins on the road will turn into high-scoring diamonds for a certain period of time.
instructions: Tap to turn left or right

title: Turret Gunner
description: You will find yourself in a thrilling air battle simulation, filled with exciting moments and countless enemy targets. You’ll be able to maneuver, shoot, and fight virtual opponents, experiencing the true adrenaline rush of an airstrike. This captivating journey into the world of aviation will leave unforgettable impressions on fans of extreme action and flying. Feel like a real pilot and enjoy the excitement of aerial combat!
instructions: For PC Gameplay: Left Mouse Button: Shoot Right Mouse Button: Launch Rocket Spacebar: Fire Howitzer Mouse: Rotate Turret and Aim Q/E: Purchase Howitzer or Rocket during gameplay Ctrl: Launch Rocket

title: Tile Fruits
description: In Tile Fruits, embark on a delectable adventure packed with vibrant fruits and captivating challenges! This 2D tile-matching game tests your strategic prowess as you aim to connect three identical fruits to advance through progressively difficult levels. Each match removes the fruits from the board, but beware: having more than seven different types of fruits on the board at once results in a loss.
instructions: Playing Tile Fruits is straightforward yet engaging. Simply tap on a fruit to select it, and then match three identical fruits to remove them from the board. As you clear levels, youll face increasing difficulty with new challenges and unique layouts. To

title: Unicycle Balance 3D
description: Balance, Pedal & Survive. Enter the wacky and challenging world of Unicycle Balance 3D, a physics-based balancing game that tests your skill, patience, and reflexes! Guide your unicyclist across surreal landscapes, avoiding obstacles and mastering the delicate art of staying upright.
instructions: Left & Right Arrow, OR A and D keys

title: Master of 3 Tiles
description: Step into a fresh take on classic Mahjong! Your mission is clear: find matching tiles, gather sets of three, and clear the board. Each level ups the challenge, sharpening your skills as you progress. Ready to conquer every board and prove your mastery? Let the tile-matching adventure begin!
instructions: 1. Find tiles with similar pictures 2. Collect three of the same tiles 3. Clear the field completely of tiles 4. Congratulations! The level is passed

title: Mermaid Princess Avater Castle
description: This is a dress-up and decorating game for girls. If you like games where you create your world, you can't miss our game. There is a group of mermaids living in the underwater world and you can live with them and create beautiful memories.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Homo Evolution
description: Create your own world and guide human evolution! Merge creatures, unlock eight evolution stages, and shape civilization from tiny spores to modern life. Explore new planets, experiment with unique paths, and enjoy endless fun in this captivating evolution game. Play now!
instructions: Explore each branch to open the next. By tapping the last two life forms at this stage, you get access to a new, previously unknown world!

title: Save the cats - Bubble shooter
description: Think strategically, aim, shoot and get rid of all the bubbles. Explore hundreds of levels with different levels of difficulty. Be as accurate as possible to free all the cats. Buy and use boosters on challenging levels. To win - clear the field of all the balloons.
instructions: - Use the guide line to aim and explode the bubbles. Balls may ricochet off walls - take this into account when aiming. - You will see the next color of balloon in the cart. Use this in your strategy. - Don't forget about the shot counter!

title: Witch & Fairy BFF
description: Two unusual girlfriends - a Fairy and a Witch - study together, although they are so different. Fairy, with her delicate pink outfits and impeccable sense of style, is always ready to offer fashion tips and create vivid images. Her girlfriend-Witch, who prefers a Gothic style, chooses mysterious and gloomy outfits. Players will be able to help both heroines choose outfits for various events. Join magical friends in their exciting fashion adventure where style and magic go hand in hand!
instructions: Meet the unusual students of the magic school and help each of them create their own unique fashionable style. The most successful images can be saved at the end of the game as PNG images. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it.

title: Mahjong Slide Puzzle
description: Experience the thrill of Mahjong puzzles! Strategically match tiles, clear the board, and conquer challenging levels to achieve high scores!
instructions: In the game, you need to move cards by tapping or sliding the screen, ensuring that cards with the same pattern are unobstructed horizontally or vertically.

title: Geometry Open World
description: Geometry Open World is a fast-paced 2D action game where players pilot a ship through perilous obstacles, engage in thrilling battles against diverse enemies, and take on epic boss fights. With a vibrant and dynamic open world, strategic upgrades, and powerful abilities, you can chart your own path to triumph. Will you conquer the challenges, defeat the bosses, and rise to become the ultimate champion in this open-world geometric action adventure?
instructions: Controls A or left arrow key = move left D or right arrow key = move right Q = use shield E = use cannons Left mouse button = interact with in-game UI

title: Solitaire L'Amour
description: Love is in the air. And so is Solitaire! Enter an enchanting world as you fall head over heels for this charming new Solitaire adventure!
instructions: Remove all cards from the tableau. Play any face-up card that is one higher or lower than the stock card.

title: Sprunki Coloring Book
description: Dive into a colorful adventure with Sprunki Coloring Book, a delightful game designed for kids and adults alike. Choose from a wide variety of adorable Sprunki characters, captivating landscapes, and fun designs to color your way. Whether you're a budding artist or simply looking to relax, Sprunki Coloring Book offers endless possibilities for self-expression. Start coloring today and discover the joy of creativity with Sprunki Coloring Book!
instructions: Mouse Click

title: Brain Challenge
description: This game will challenge your mind, think out of the box Unexpected and mind-blowing answers will amaze you 250 Fun levels. Features: - Solve fun & mind-challenging puzzles - Think out of the box - Simple & addictive gameplay ** Credits: "Ukulele" "Royalty Free Music from Bensound" "Forest" & "calm-bgm" Music by "BandCamp - syncopika" Menu vector created by jcomp - www.freepik.com Menu vector created by upklyak - www.freepik.com
instructions: Drag and Drop, Click

title: Boxteria
description: Dive into an amazing cubic world, where you can become anyone from a BANDIT to a ZOMBIE attacking everyone around! Imagine having 20 super cool cars at your disposal to ride, drift, and have fun on maps like "Russian Village," and "Courtyard," spaces filled with adventures. You'll enjoy creating characters, each unique in their own way. You can assemble a team of bandits, zombies, or even police officers and engage in thrilling battles or cool races.
instructions: Control on the computer: Shoot \ Spawn Character (or Car) = "LMB" (left mouse button) Settings - "Esc" Select Character \ Car for Spawn - "Tab" Scroll through weapons \ tools - "Mouse Wheel" Jump - "Space" Get in the car - "B" Start War - "V" Control on the phone is carried out using the buttons on the screen :) Enjoy the game!

title: Warfare 1942 - online shooter
description: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of World War II, where every battle is a unique fight for survival! The game is designed for military enthusiasts and those who love intense online battles. It’s the perfect choice for players who prefer shooters with detailed gameplay, a variety of characters, and customization. Suitable for both seasoned fighters and newcomers.
instructions: In the game, you can connect with other players and participate in session-based battles. The winner is the one who scores the most points by the end of the match! Controls for keyboard and mouse: TAB - pause menu WASD - movement SPACE - jump C - crouch M - open map 1 - 5 - select item LMB - shoot RMB - aim R - reload U - use dog ability T - type in chat

title: Extreme Real Car Driving 2025
description: This ultimate car racing 3D lets you experience real car driving simulator like highway racing with its realistic car damage, accurate car driving physics and many other features. Car driver may use steering wheel, accelerator meter or buttons to control the car. Enjoy the best car driving simulator game and drag racing game that has an addictive game play with endless fun. Now you can modify your any sports race cars from garage according to your interest.
instructions: Use "W,A,S,D" for player movement.

title: Valentine's Day Couple Date
description: Experience the charm of Paris in Valentine's Day Couple Date, an amazing couple dress-up game for girls. Start with a picturesque breakfast and help Ellie glam up. Next, keep their fitness streak alive with a couple's workout as you dress them both in fashionable gym outfits and accessories. Later, style Ellie & Ben for a dreamy rooftop dinner. Choose from trendy clothing, accessories, and chic hairstyles to create the perfect romantic ambiance. Stay tuned for a special surprise from Ben.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on a desktop, or tap to play to mobile devices.

title: Strategy of war. Tanks and helicopters.
description: "Strategy of war" is an exciting strategy war game where the player has to control squads of tanks and helicopters, develop his base, choose battle tactics and fight the enemy. The game offers a wide range of equipment and weapons, a variety of missions and tasks, as well as the opportunity to improve and develop their forces. It is important to properly allocate resources, as well as use tactical techniques to defeat the enemy.
instructions: The game "Strategy of war" is the implementation of a modern RTS game with the necessary game mechanics, such as base management, command of troops, military tactics (including both defensive and offensive tactics), base capture, ground and air battles. The main goal of the game is to capture and hold all enemy bases. Your base is green. Enemy bases are red and yellow. Neutral bases are gray. The combat units in the game are tanks and helicopters.

title: Madness Cars Destroy
description: The game features 6 unique modes: Funnel: Push cars into the abyss as the funnel narrows! Rotating Cube: Stay on the spinning cube, which speeds up over time! Deadly Arena: Dodge falling bombs and collapsing floors—or shoot players instead! Right Color: Inspired by Roblox, but with cars! Deadly Bouncers: Avoid spinning mines in a gladiator-style arena! Hot Potato: Pass the bomb or explode! Choose from foreign or Russian cars and dive into the action!
instructions: Computer controls: TAB - pause W, A, S, D - control the car on the ground Space - brake Mobile device controls: Clicking on the touch game buttons on the screen

title: Cute Relaxing Matching 3 Tiles
description: Fun Farm Wonderland is a light but extremely fun game from our team Fun Farm Wonderland is a puzzle game combined with a Farm theme, to create a feeling of lightness and relaxation for all players participating in them. Have you ever played a match 3 tiles game with such cute design and interface? If not, don't skip our game, for the following reasons
instructions: Use your mouse to play and make the match 3

title: Ice Skating Ballerina
description: Dive into a winter wonderland and help Ellie and Ben prep for an exciting ice skating competition. Customize skates, curate dazzling outfits, and make a style statement on the ice. Browse through a vast collection of colorful ballerina and glam outfits, chic accessories, and shoes. Glide, twirl, and experience the fun-filled, fashion-centric icy adventure with this engaging dress-up game for girls.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on a desktop, tap to play on mobile devices.
